name: Bagman Strikes Back (PC version)
description:
This game is a tribute to Bagman, an arcade game released by Valadon Automation in 1982. It is also the sequel to Bagman Comes Back.

This version is made up of 24 completely new stages.

NB: If you are using Google Chrome to download the game, you may be warned that the file is not downloaded often and that it could be dangerous. That is only a precautionary notice. Open the menu via the button to the right of the message and select "Keep". Then use your PC's antivirus to make sure it is a completely secure file.
